attributes.action: Prevent private hospitals from selling donated blood  at a profit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present the National Blood Service sells blood at the same price to the NHS and Private Hospitals,(the charge covers the cost of collecting,testing,processing,and distributing the blood).Private Hospitals can charge their patients or health insurance companies as they choose.At present the Department of Health does not see it as the role of Government to restrict the price that private hospitals are able to charge for donated blood.i think that blood donors do not want their blood sold at a profit.
